attributes.action: Barton hill Minster 500 homes and 5 GYPSY/Traveler sites
attributes.additional_details:
The west of Barton Hill Drive, Minster
The site located to the south-west  of the centre of Minster,This policy allocates approximately 25 ha for residential developement for a minimum of 500 dwellings (including 5 pitches for gypsies and travellers) major landscaping and open space.

Please sign this petition to object to the plans.

To really make an impact please also send your comments to:-
Local plans Team
Swale House
Sittingbourne
East Street
Kent ME10 3HT
email: planning@swale.gov.uk

website:- www.swale.gov.uk/planning
(follow the links to BEARING FRUITS)
